attributes.action: STOP THE HOSUING OF ILLEGAL IMIGRANTS IN THE BOROUGH OF HILLINGDON
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, are residents and members of the Hillingdon community who are deeply concerned about the ongoing use of local housing, hotels, and HMOs to accommodate illegal immigrants within our borough. We believe this practice: - Places additional strain on already stretched local services (including schools, healthcare, and housing). - Raises safety and safeguarding concerns, particularly in areas close to schools and residential neighbourhoods. - Is being done without full consultation of residents or transparency from national and local government. - Is unsustainable and unfair to local residents on housing waiting lists and those paying council tax
attributes.background: Cease housing of illegal immigrants in hotels,HMOs,and residential properties within Hillingdon.Protect the housing stock for those legally entitled to it,including vulnerable local families and residents Requesttransparency and accountability from the Home Office and other authorities involved in.
